name: Set Up Superannuation Account
description: Open a superannuation account or review existing contributions to maximise retirement savings and benefits.

name: Emergency Fund Check-Up
description: Review the emergency fund to ensure it covers at least 6 months' worth of essential expenses.

name: Research ASX Investment Options
description: Explore shares, ETFs, or managed funds on the ASX to diversify investments and grow wealth.

name: Establish Kids' Education Fund
description: Set up an education savings plan for future schooling expenses, such as private school fees or university.

name: Refine Personal Financial Plan
description: Consult a financial planner to update and refine a comprehensive strategy for long-term wealth building.

name: Explore Passive Income Opportunities
description: Look into Australian property investments or high-yield savings accounts to create reliable passive income streams.

name: Review Financial Year Goals
description: As the financial year ends, assess progress on goals and set priorities for the new tax year.
